## BrushType enumeration

指定画笔的类型。

```csharp
public enum BrushType
```

### 价值观

| 姓名 | 价值 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Solid | `0` | 类型为 ISolidBrush |
| Texture | `1` | 类型为 ITextureBrush |
| LinearGradient | `2` | 类型为 ILinearGradientBrush |
